properties.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 6:37PM AKST until January 8 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow showers. Reports of around 3 to 4 inches in the
Sitka area have been received in the last few hours. Additional
snowfall of 1 to 2 inches expected in the next few hours.

* WHERE...Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area.

* WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bands of heavy snow showers expected to
continue for the next one to two hours before starting to taper
off.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT for Sitka
